attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want to see the unfair system of freezing of State Pensions over turned for those of us on retirement would like to join our Families in Commonwealth Countries there is no justification for this, after all many of of us have worked and paid taxes all our working lives.If you live in a E.U. Country or the U.S.A.  you receive your full pension for life, it is a scandal that people who would like to live in a Commonwealth Country are treated in this manor.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
